name: Colors [Prologue]
description:
Prologue is only available for the moment, the rest of the game will come at the end of the SuNoFes jam (September 4th).

In the world of Colors, a little child named Blanche is pursued by the Guard of Lady Rainbow. They have stolen her seven balls of color. The balance of Colors is thus endangered... But Blanche doesn't care about that... Their only goal is to offer them to their father Noir so that they can admire with him the colors of the world, although he can't see anything...

  • A cute fantasy adventure about colors
  • Three clearly-marked endings
  • Beautiful sprites and original music
  • Seven original mini-games
  • More than 10 000 words (around 1h per playthrough)
  • Available in English and French

Background of the main menu by denamorado on Freepik
